meanings.definition: A building where animals are slaughtered for food.
meanings.sent1: The abattoirs in town provide fresh meat for the market.
meanings.sent2: The farmer took his livestock to the abattoirs for processing.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally ended up at the abattoirs instead of the grocery store.
meanings.sent4: The abattoirs stood like a silent giant, processing animals day and night.
meanings.sent5: The smell of blood and meat filled the air around the abattoirs.

meanings.definition: The business of slaughtering animals for food.
meanings.sent1: She inherited the family abattoirs and continued the tradition.
meanings.sent2: The abattoirs industry plays a crucial role in the food supply chain.
meanings.sent3: The abattoirs business was booming, much to the delight of the shareholders.
meanings.sent4: In the world of abattoirs, efficiency and hygiene are paramount.
meanings.sent5: The abattoirs owners were known for their ethical practices in animal handling.
